compliant.section: 我們可能會不定期修改隱私權的相關政策。
compliant.legal provisions: The right to be informed about changes to privacy policies.

non_compliant.section: 如有任何變更，我們將不會另行通知個別使用者，因此我們鼓勵您定期查看我們的隱私權規範。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The requirement to notify users of changes to privacy policies.
non_compliant.amend: Ensure that users are notified of changes to the privacy policy, either directly or through a prominent notice.
